markdownRemark.html:
I'm just about to have a chapter published about the use of Animals in Elizabeth Bishop's poetry - its coming out next month.

Now to be clear, this is an academic book published by Cambridge University Press - so it may not be for general consumption - and I had to complete the chapter at very short notice due to an impending birth of my child (!). So if it's your thing, please take a look!

frontmatter.title: New Chapter in Elizabeth Bishop Collection
frontmatter.tags: poetry, academic, elizabeth bishop, animals, phd
